text: Yesli dlya nevernykh budet takoye muchitel'noye nakazaniye, to dlya veruyushchikh budet velikaya nagrada: ray, kotoryy byl obeshchan im. V rayu, kotoryy Allakh obeshchal tem, kto uveroval, izbeg zabluzhdeniya i priderzhivalsya istiny, techot presnaya voda vnizu pod derev'yami, postoyanno dayushchimi plody i ten'. Eto - nagrada tem, kotoryye izbegali zla i byli bogoboyaznenny, a nakazaniye dlya nevernykh - ogon'
